general.version: A new version of the site is available, please refresh your browser.

errors.400: The request body can‚Äôt be parsed as valid JSON.
errors.404: The endpoint is not defined, or contains invalid methods, or is missing HTTP headers.
errors.401: Unauthorized, maybe invalid email or password.
errors.20001: This password is too short, at least 8 characters are required.
errors.20002: This email has already been registered.
errors.20004: No user with that email found.
errors.20110: Authentication token is not valid for this device.
errors.20114: The label must not be empty.
errors.20119: Asset PIN format invalid, must be a six digit number.

masthead.title: Welcome to BigONE
masthead.description: The most secure and convenient multi-token exchange in the world.

password.label: Password
password.description: We will send an email to %{email} to guide you through the process of changing your password.

otp.label: 2-Factor Authentication
otp.description: We will send an email to %{email} to guide you through the process of changing your 2-Factor Authentication.

description.main: The Asset PIN is an optional six digit number chosen by you which will be required each time you wish to make a withdrawal. For security reasons it is NOT POSSIBLE to reset it, so please ensure that you do not forget it. Your Asset PIN is a number chosen by you, and IS NOT the same as your 2-factor authentication code.
description.old: Enter your current Asset PIN (if you have forgotten your current Asset PIN, please CLICK HERE to verify your identity to reset your Asset PIN):
description.new: New Asset PIN (leave this blank to disable the Asset PIN requirement for withdrawals):
You have not verified your identity yet, please CLICK HERE to apply for verification.
description.submitted: You have successfully submitted your identity verification request, please wait patiently, as the process can take up to 48 hours, or longer if we are experiencing extraordinarily high user volumes.
description.denied: Your identity verification has been denied, please prepare your submission carefully and CLICK HERE to apply again. Too many failed verifications may result in a permanent ban.

language.label: Language
language.description: This will change the language of both the interface and all email communications.

notice.terms: By proceeding, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service, and confirming that you are not a citizen or resident of the United States.
notice.american: United States citizens and residents are currently prohibited from using our platform while we await US federal and state licensing. Please see here for more details, and thank you for your patience!
notice.confirm: To confirm you agree to our TOS and wish to proceed, please provide your email address.
notice.verify.email: Enter the verification code sent to your email %{email}.
notice.otp.qrcode: Please use an Authenticator app on your mobile phone to scan the QR code below to create a 2FA code in order to continue.
notice.otp.secret: If you can't scan the QR code, manually enter the secret key %{secret}.
notice.name.password: Enter your name and a secure password.

notice.trust: Will you trust this computer and use it to access your BigONE account regularly?

reset.otp.notice: We will send you an email to guide you through the process of recovering your 2-Factor Authentication.

success.instruction: Your 2-Factor Authentication recovery instructions have been sent, please check your email and follow the instructions to finish the process.
success.update: Your 2-Factor Authentication has been updated successfully. Please sign in with the new one.

reset.asset.pin.title: Reset Asset PIN
reset.asset.pin.notice: New Asset PIN (leave this blank to disable the Asset PIN requirement for withdrawals):
reset.asset.pin.success: Your Asset PIN has been updated successfully.

notice.email: We will send you an email to guide you through the process of recovering your password.

success.instruction: Your password recovery instructions have been sent, please check your email and follow the instructions to finish the process.
success.update: Your password has been updated successfully. Please sign in with the new password.

system.title: Your %{currency} Deposit Memo
system.memo: You MUST send your deposit using the deposit memo above. Failure to do so may result in the loss of your deposit.

notice.title: Your %{currency} Deposit Address
notice.address: Please double-check this address in your wallet before depositing. We recommend sending a small transaction first to ensure the deposit address is correct.
notice.qrcode: You can use the QR Code below if your %{currency} wallet supports QR codes. After scanning, please double-check that the deposit address matches the address shown above!
notice.generate: Your %{currency} deposit address is still being generated, thanks for your patience.
notice.verification: If you haven't applied for identity verification yet, we strongly recommend you to do that HERE in order to be able to trade and make withdrawals.

notice.form: Please fill out this form extremely carefully, withdrawals are processed immediately and are irreversible!
notice.fee: A fixed mining fee of %{amount} %{currency} will be charged for this withdrawal, please ensure you have enough %{currency} in your account before proceeding, or your withdrawal will fail.
notice.confirm: Please double-check the info you've provided, withdrawals are processed immediately and are irreversible!

verification.reason: In order to comply with government regulations and fight money laundering and other illegal activities, all users must undergo identity verification in order to make withdrawals.
verification.routine: Please CLICK HERE to apply for identity verification, and carefully fill out the form on the next page.

asset.pin.notice: If these details are correct, please enter your Asset PIN to confirm the withdrawal.
asset.pin.warning: You have not yet set an Asset PIN, we recommend you do so at your earliest convenience in order to better secure your account.
